```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
NUMBER <- as.integer(rmarkdown::metadata$pa_num)
LECTURE_NUMBER <- read_csv("key_dates.csv") |>
    filter(`Course Element` == "Class Session") |>
    filter(str_detect(Details, 
                      sprintf("Lecture #%02g", NUMBER))) |>
    pull(`Item Number`)
due_date_str <- read_csv("key_dates.csv") |> 
    filter(`Course Element` == "Pre-Assignments", 
           `Item Number` == LECTURE_NUMBER, 
           str_detect(Details, "Due")) |> 
    mutate(dt = parse_date_time(paste(Date, Time), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M%p")) |>
    pull(dt) |>
    format("%Y-%m-%d (%A) at %I:%M%P") |>
    paste(sprintf("(before Class Session #%02g)", LECTURE_NUMBER))
```
